statements: UPDATE patient_medication_adherence SET actual_dosage='2 pills' WHERE patient_id=1 AND medication_name='Aspirin';
UPDATE patient_medication_adherence SET adherence_ratio=0.85, prescribed_dosage='1 tablet' WHERE patient_id=2 AND medication_name='Ibuprofen';
UPDATE patient_medication_adherence SET adherence_ratio = 0.75 WHERE patient_id = 1234 AND medication_name = 'Aspirin';
UPDATE patient_medication_adherence SET actual_dosage = '2 pills' WHERE prescribed_dosage = '1 pill' AND adherence_ratio < 0.60;
UPDATE Patients SET patient_age = 40 WHERE patient_id = 1;
